item.text: For things discussed in a previous [[DAO Design Jam]] see [[DAO Sunday 1]]
We have been exploring the idea of visualising or representing a DAO. Apart from Minecraft (or other in game simulation) DAO can be represented in an art project.

We have been exploring the idea of visualising or representing a DAO. Apart from Minecraft (or other in game simulation) DAO can be represented in an art project with actor network theory ontological twist.
Robotots usually move, but a robot plant moves like a plant. It may turn slowly towards the sun, or it may be still. However it breathes, in captures energy, and it produces. It is alive.
item.title: Robot Plant

We have been exploring the idea of visualising or representing a DAO. Apart from Minecraft (or other in game simulation)

Using block chain looks promising for the internet of things i.e IBM and Samsung Adept. Though DAO can include people and things in an art project with actor network theory ontological twist. For example with plantoids. See David's post:

We have been exploring the idea of visualising or representing a DAO. Apart from Minecraft (or other in game simulation) it can be represented in art projects as a way to formulate social and political concept in a non academic ways.
